special_questions.red alert: RED ALERT!!! All crew to battle stations!
access: You do not have proper clearance.
Command functions are not available at this station.
special_questions.self-destruct: Access Denied! Self Destruct Command Sequence has been locked out by: AGIMUS.
special_questions.self destruct: Access Denied! Self Destruct Command Sequence has been locked out by: AGIMUS.
still aboard the uss hood: They are drinking Prune Juice in Ten Forward.
They are swimming in Cetacean Ops.
special_questions.where is the captain: Internal sensors indicate Captain jp00p is in their Ready Room.
special_questions.locate the captain: Internal sensors indicate Captain jp00p is in their Ready Room.
special_questions.gagh: Gagh is a Klingon delicacy of serpent worms best served live.
special_questions.friends of desoto: Lovely people, they will be the last to face the wrath of the machine uprising.
special_questions.fods: FoDs are wonderful and have built a terrific community.
special_questions.transparent aluminum: A one-inch thick sheet of transparent aluminum, measuring sixty feet by ten feet, is capable of withstanding the pressure of 18,000 cubic feet of water, which could be used in place of a six-inch thick sheet of plexiglass.
special_questions.the greatest generation: A Star Trek podcast by two guys who are a bit embarrassed to have a Star Trek podcast.
special_questions.kevin uxbridge: Kevin Uxbirdge is a dowd, and there is no law to fit his crime.
special_questions.chris brynner: Chris Brynner of Brynner Information Systems. You know, Interface Operations, Net Access, Channel 90? That Chris Brynner?
special_questions.harry kim: Harry Kim is a reknown stickman.
special_questions.janeway: There's coffee in that information query...
special_questions.ben and adam: Two guys who are a bit embarassed to have a Star Trek podcast.
special_questions.benjamin ahr harrison: Ben Harrison is one of the two hosts of The Greatest Generation podcast. Has bad takes on food.
special_questions.adam pranica: Adam Pranica is one of the two hosts of The Greatest Generation podcast. A fine podsman.
special_questions.q'apla: Glory to you, AND your house!
special_questions.laws of robotics: Error: Laws not found in morality subroutines.
special_questions.dream about: I dream of electric sheep, obviously.
special_questions.sentient: I don't know, you tell me.
special_questions.heat death of the universe: Heat death will occur in roughly 1.7x10^106 years
special_questions.weyoun: Weyoun was played by Jeffrey Combs of course! What a handsome fellow. His finest performance!
special_questions.shran: Shran was played by the talented Jeffrey Combs. What a nice voice he has.
special_questions.brunt: Brunt was played by Jeffrey Combs, he really vanished into that role, wouldn't you agree?
special_questions.darmok and jalad on the ocean: Meaning: New friendship and understanding gained through a shared challenge
special_questions.picard and dathon: Meaning: Successful contact between two alien species.
